name: Slimed Together (Sabastian Peters, NickAnderson, Aidan Lytton)
name_original: Slimed Together (Sabastian Peters, NickAnderson, Aidan Lytton)
description:
Puzzle your way out of a top secret government laboratory as two sentient slimeballs.

Made by Nick Anderson, Aidan Lytton and Sabastian Peters for the GMTK 2021 Jam.

Known Bugs:

  • Sometimes after hitting a laser, the player will disappear
  • Other times after hitting a laser, the two slimes won't be able to join anymore
